screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .aks file in Arkos Tracker 2
screenshot.caption: AKS file open in Arkos Tracker 2

description: Arkos Tracker is a Windows-only freeware audio tracking program based on the STarKos tracker. The AKS format was introduced in the 1980s when the first version of Arkos Tracker was released.

While the first version is no longer developed, the Arkos Tracker 2, a complete rewrite of the software, is still developed and available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. To save an audio module as an AKS file with Arkos Tracker 2, select File â†’ Save song as .
